00018 #ifndef __AUDACITY_WIDGETS_PROGRESSDIALOG__
00019 #define __AUDACITY_WIDGETS_PROGRESSDIALOG__

00021 #include "../Audacity.h"

00023 #include <wx/defs.h>
00024 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00025 #include <wx/gauge.h>
00026 #include <wx/stattext.h>
00027 #include <wx/utils.h>
00028 
00029 enum
00030 {
00031    eProgressCancelled = 0, //<! User says that whatever is happening is undesirable and shouldn't have happened at all
00032    eProgressSuccess,       //<! User says nothing, everything works fine, continue doing whatever we're doing
00033    eProgressFailed,        //<! Something has gone wrong, we should stop and cancel everything we did
00034    eProgressStopped        //<! Nothing is wrong, but user says we should stop now and leave things as they are now
00035 };
00036 
00037 enum ProgressDialogFlags
00038 {
00039    pdlgEmptyFlags = 0x00000000,
00040    pdlgHideStopButton = 0x00000001,
00041    pdlgHideCancelButton = 0x00000002
00042 } ;
00043 
00047 
00048 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ProgressDialog:public wxDialog
00049 {
00050 
00051  public:
00052 
00053    ProgressDialog(const wxString & title, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString, ProgressDialogFlags flags = pdlgEmptyFlags);
00054    virtual ~ProgressDialog();
00055 
00056    bool Show(bool show = true);
00057 
00058    int Update(int value, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00059    int Update(double current, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00060    int Update(double current, double total, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00061    int Update(wxULongLong_t current, wxULongLong_t total, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00062    int Update(wxLongLong current, wxLongLong total, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00063    int Update(wxLongLong_t current, wxLongLong_t total, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00064    int Update(int current, int total, const wxString & message = wxEmptyString);
00065    void SetMessage(const wxString & message);
00066 
00067  private:
00068    void OnCancel(wxCommandEvent & e);
00069    void OnStop(wxCommandEvent & e);
00070    void Beep();
00071 
00072  protected:
00073    wxStaticText *mElapsed;
00074    wxStaticText *mRemaining;
00075    wxGauge *mGauge;
00076 
00077    wxLongLong_t mStartTime;
00078    wxLongLong_t mLastUpdate;
00079    int mLastValue; // gauge value, range = [0,1000]
00080 
00081    bool mCancel;
00082    bool mStop;
00083 
00084  private:
00085    wxWindow *mHadFocus;
00086    wxStaticText *mMessage;
00087    wxWindowDisabler *mDisable;
00088    
00089    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE();
00090 };
